title: Ravengard's Scourger
content:
rt of man who works with his hands, and communicates in grunts. In his heart his son vowed to do better. But when Wyll was born, Ravengard felt a strange gravity that drew him away from his son.

BG3 Ravengard's Scourger Information

Commander's Strike: Direct an ally to strike a foe. The ally uses a reaction on their next turn to make a weapon attack. Tenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal 1 Bludgeoning damage anyway. Range: 1.5m
